bibl.title: Exactores in the Papyri and in the Legal Codes.
bibl.note: Looks at the evidence for the office of "exactor", both that which comes from Egypt and that which relates to the Empire outside Egypt.

bibl.title: Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987

bibl.seg: Thomas J. David, Exactores in the Papyri and in the Legal Codes.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987 (Bologna, 1989) pp. 683-691.
Looks at the evidence for the office of "exactor", both that which comes from Egypt and that which relates to the Empire outside Egypt.
